caption: Relating to the issuance of gold and silver specie and the establishment of a currency based on gold and silver; authorizing a fee.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill establishes a gold and silver-based currency system in Texas. It allows individuals to purchase, hold, and redeem gold/silver currency through a state depository account. The comptroller will manage the system and may charge fees for transactions. The bill prohibits transactions with countries known for illegal or terrorist activities, which could affect Chinese residents depending on US-China relations. The currency can be redeemed for US dollars or physical gold/silver.

Summary (Chinese):
